content.html:
@michael_deleo Can you apply this patch to fix this test failure?

diff -r a9a918babb44 gazebo/physics/CylinderShape.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/CylinderShape.cc   Wed Jan 20 16:36:48 2016 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/physics/CylinderShape.cc   Thu Jan 21 13:36:36 2016 -0800
@@ -115,5 +115,5 @@
 /////////////////////////////////////////////////
 double CylinderShape::ComputeVolume() const
 {
-  return IGN_CYLINDER_VOLUME(this->GetLength(), this->GetRadius());
+  return IGN_CYLINDER_VOLUME(this->GetRadius(), this->GetLength());
 }
